extendedInfo.description: Memory Shield is a progressive memory challenge that will test and compel you to find creative and logical solutions using memory association.  Memory association is the ability to apply concepts in a fashion that allows you to recall material based on specific and/or related meaning.  An easy example of this is that laughing is generally an indication of oneâs amusement and thus associated together. What better way than to practice and increase your memory association than with a game?Sharpen your mind with the benefits of memorization, challenge yourself with various difficulties and attempt to conquer each aspect of Memory Shield!  The later levels will prove difficult for even the most astute memorizers.  (Unless, of course, you have photographic memoryâ¦)Please rate and give feedback on this app, we will do our best to answer all relevant questions!  Donât forget check us out on the web:Xiphoid-entertainment.blogspot.comWIN THE CONTEST!!  Currently there is a contest for submitted patterns that will be added to future updates of Memory Shield! See our website for details.FEATURES:-Fifteen(15) levels with scaling difficulty-Over One Hundred (100+) unique designs in Pattern Mode-Three(3) random modes for the standard game-Four(4) difficulty levels to add to your experience and challenge-Sound-Nine(9) images to customize your memorization experience-Appropriate for kids, adults and anybody in-between-Good for your brain and problem solving skills-Fast and easy to play and put downKEYWORDS:memory game, memory games, kids memory game, kid memory games, kid games, kid memory, good memory game, memory, games, game, puzzle, best, easy, hard, fun, challenging, fast, IQ, smart, brain, free, free game, free memory game, entertaining, quick, learn, think, nice, shield, memory shield, improve, short-term, long term, association, progress, progressive, levels, awesome, cool, difficult, terrific, app, memory app, brain game, memory tool,
